description: Phonopy meta info, not specific to any code

metaInfos.description: Information about properties that concern phonopy calculations.
metaInfos.name: x_phonopy_input

metaInfos.description: Amplitude of the atom diplacement for the phonopy supercell
metaInfos.name: x_phonopy_displacement

metaInfos.description: Original cell from which the supercell for the DFT calculations was constructed
metaInfos.name: x_phonopy_original_system_ref

metaInfos.description: Symmetry threshold for the space group identification of the crystal for which the vibrational properties are to be calculated
metaInfos.name: x_phonopy_symprec

metaInfos.description: Vibrational free energy calculated from phonon frequencies per unit cell
metaInfos.name: x_phonopy_free_energy

metaInfos.description: Heat Capacity calculated from vibrational free energy
metaInfos.name: x_phonopy_heat_capacity

metaInfos.description: Temperatures at which properties such as the free energy are calculated
metaInfos.name: x_phonopy_temperature
